title: Was a Woman Prosecuted for Laughing During Jeff Sessions’ Confirmation Hearing?
subtitle: Desiree Fairooz, a member of the protest group Code Pink, was charged with disorderly conduct after laughing during the introduction of Attorney General nominee Jeff Sessions.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Code Pink member Desiree Fairooz was prosecuted for disorderly conduct after she laughed during Attorney General Jeff Sessions's confirmation hearing.
